des: "A friend of mine made me one of these one day and now this is my favorite summertime or anytime drink. Cool, creamy, and refreshing."
ins: In a cocktail mixer full of ice, combine brandy, Blue Curacao, vanilla liqueur, half-and-half and lemon juice. Shake vigorously, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a straw.
